languages.text: "Да. Сначала это можно было принять за лизоблюдство и попытку задобрить "звездных гостей", однако чем дальше, тем больше преступного умысла в подобном оттягивании неизбежного".

traits.locale_text: "Да. Он действовал нешаблонно, явно пытался коммуницировать. А еще раньше — вырваться из клетки. Поведение, не свойственное киберзверю".

languages.text: "Indeed. At first, one could mistake it for sycophancy and an attempt to appease the 'celestial guests,' but the longer it goes on, the more apparent the criminal intent behind this stalling of the inevitable becomes."
languages.original_text: "Да. Сначала это можно было принять за лизоблюдство и попытку задобрить "звездных гостей", однако чем дальше, тем больше преступного умысла в подобном оттягивании неизбежного".

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. It could at first be mistaken for sycophancy and an attempt to appease the 'celestial guests,' but the longer it goes on, the more apparent is the criminal intent behind this stalling to delay the inevitable."

"Indeed. It could at first be mistaken for sycophancy and an attempt to appease the 'celestial guests,' but the longer it goes on, the more apparent is the criminal intent behind this stalling to delay the inevitable."

"Indeed. At first, one could mistake it for sycophancy and an attempt to appease the 'celestial guests,' but the longer it goes on, the more apparent the criminal intent behind this stalling of the inevitable becomes."

"Indeed. At first, one could mistake it for sycophancy and an attempt to appease the 'celestial guests,' but the longer it goes on, the more apparent the criminal intent behind this stalling of the inevitable becomes."

"Indeed. At first, one could mistake it for sycophancy and an attempt to appease the 'celestial guests,' but the longer it goes on, the more apparent the criminal intent behind this stalling of the inevitable becomes."

"Indeed. At first, one could mistake it for sycophancy and an attempt to appease the 'celestial guests,' but the longer it goes on, the more apparent the criminal intent behind this stalling of the inevitable becomes."

languages.text: "In der Tat. Zunächst könnte man das für Speichelleckerei halten, für einen Versuch, die 'himmlischen Gäste' zu besänftigen. Aber je länger es dauert, desto deutlicher wird die kriminelle Absicht hinter diesem Hinauszögern des Unvermeidlichen."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. At first, one could mistake it for sycophancy and an attempt to appease the 'celestial guests,' but the longer it goes on, the more apparent the criminal intent behind this stalling of the inevitable becomes."

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat. Zunächst könnte man das für Speichelleckerei halten, für einen Versuch, die 'himmlischen Gäste' zu besänftigen. Aber je länger es dauert, desto deutlicher wird die kriminelle Absicht hinter diesem Hinauszögern des Unvermeidlichen."

languages.text: « En effet. Son attitude pourrait passer pour de la flagornerie dans l'espoir d'apaiser les "visiteurs célestes", mais plus ça dure, plus il devient apparent que ses efforts pour retarder l'inévitable cachent des intentions criminelles. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed. At first, one could mistake it for sycophancy and an attempt to appease the 'celestial guests,' but the longer it goes on, the more apparent the criminal intent behind this stalling of the inevitable becomes."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Son attitude pourrait passer pour de la flagornerie dans l'espoir d'apaiser les "visiteurs célestes", mais plus ça dure, plus il devient apparent que ses efforts pour retarder l'inévitable cachent des intentions criminelles. »

languages.text: 「確かに。最初のうちは、ただのへつらいか、『天のお客人』をなだめようとする行為と見なされたかもしれません。ですが、時間が経つにつれて、避けられぬ事態を引き延ばそうとするその行動の裏に、明らかな犯罪の意図が見えてきました」
languages.original_text: "Indeed. At first, one could mistake it for sycophancy and an attempt to appease the 'celestial guests,' but the longer it goes on, the more apparent the criminal intent behind this stalling of the inevitable becomes."

traits.locale_text: 「確かに。最初のうちは、ただのへつらいか、『天のお客人』をなだめようとする行為と見なされたかもしれません。ですが、時間が経つにつれて、避けられぬ事態を引き延ばそうとするその行動の裏に、明らかな犯罪の意図が見えてきました」

languages.text: «Efectivamente. Al principio se podría considerar adulación, un intento de complacer a los "visitantes celestiales", pero, cuanto más se prolonga, más claro está que este constante retraso de lo inevitable tiene motivos criminales».
languages.original_text: "Indeed. At first, one could mistake it for sycophancy and an attempt to appease the 'celestial guests,' but the longer it goes on, the more apparent the criminal intent behind this stalling of the inevitable becomes."

traits.locale_text: «Efectivamente. Al principio se podría considerar adulación, un intento de complacer a los "visitantes celestiales", pero, cuanto más se prolonga, más claro está que este constante retraso de lo inevitable tiene motivos criminales».

languages.text: “确实如此。这种行为乍看之下像是在拍马屁，试图讨好所谓的‘来自上界的客人’。但拖得越久，这种行为背后的犯罪意图就越是明显。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed. At first, one could mistake it for sycophancy and an attempt to appease the 'celestial guests,' but the longer it goes on, the more apparent the criminal intent behind this stalling of the inevitable becomes."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。这种行为乍看之下像是在拍马屁，试图讨好所谓的‘来自上界的客人’。但拖得越久，这种行为背后的犯罪意图就越是明显。”

languages.text: "Kesinlikle. İlk bakışta 'semavi konuklara' misafirperverlik, hatta dalkavukluk ettiği sanılabilir ama kaçınılmazı geciktirmeye çalıştıkça art niyeti günden güne açığa çıkıyor."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. At first, one could mistake it for sycophancy and an attempt to appease the 'celestial guests,' but the longer it goes on, the more apparent the criminal intent behind this stalling of the inevitable becomes."

traits.locale_text: "Kesinlikle. İlk bakışta 'semavi konuklara' misafirperverlik, hatta dalkavukluk ettiği sanılabilir ama kaçınılmazı geciktirmeye çalıştıkça art niyeti günden güne açığa çıkıyor."
